name: Earn That Bread
description:
This game is an entry for the Mini Jam 94: Baking game jam.
The game jam came with a limitation: You can only use 2 buttons.

In Earn That Bread, your goal is to supply the city with bread. But you have never baked before, and need to build a furnace first. The smell of the freshly baked bread will attract some hungry goblins, so be careful.

Unity Engine 2020.3.19f1 was used.
Credits for Bensound.com for the music.
